name: Take the A-Train 3 S.V.
summary: The Super Famicom port of the the third installment of the A-Train series. Originally released for the personal computers in Japan in 1990, it was later ported to other gaming systems such as the PC-Engine CD in 1993 as well for the Super Famicom in 1995. So far, only the PC-Engine CD version was re-released for the Wii Virtual Console.
